name: Darkhold: Embers' Tale
description:
The game is about an explorer named Ember, and her miraculous findings of a decrepit city. After finding an artifact that allows her to manipulate the city and all it’s structures, she must use this power to travel deeper into the center of the city, and eventually discover the secrets behind its past.

Game Documentation Also included in the zip file

WASD to move

Right Click to aim

left click to fire
